stories.headline: Senior Russian officer shot in Moscow in apparent assassination attempt
stories.description: An unidentified individual has shot Lieutenant General Alekseyev before fleeing the scene, authorities say.

stories.headline: Settler violence stokes peak West Bank displacement since October 2023: UN
stories.description: January’s data is particularly high after removal of an entire herding community in the Jordan Valley, OCHA says.

stories.headline: ‘Magical atmosphere’: Kite fever lights up Lahore as Basant boosts economy
stories.description: Spring festival comeback injects millions of dollars into local economy as businesses cash in on Basant frenzy.

stories.headline: Mexico’s tariffs on India are a double whammy after US tariffs
stories.description: The steep hikes by Mexico have devastated several Indian industries already reeling under crushing US tariffs.

stories.headline: Armed militia members are serving as Israeli agents in Gaza: Investigation
stories.description: Al Jazeera documentary identifies Gaza armed groups working with Israeli forces.
